title: Local dev setup in minutes with docker
author: pardahlman
content: readme.md docker infrastructureproof concept how docker be used set a local development environment within minutes.install> git clone https://github.com/pardahlman/docker-infrastructure.git> cd docker-infrastructure> docker volume create mongodata> docker volume create rabbitmq> docker volume create mssql> docker-compose that's . services should up running default port:mongodb, port 27017kibana, port 5601elastic search, port 9200 9300rabbitmq port 15672 (mgmt) 5672mssql, port 1433read more wrote blog post this.feedbackregister issue!
